settings.text: The People Have Chosen: The Best of 2025 —Timeless Elegance Meets Modern Uniqueness

settings.content: Each year, certain rings captivate hearts more than others. Our customers have highlighted these standout pieces to help you find something extraordinary yet beloved. In order of best selling, we present the most unique engagement rings of 2025.

settings.text: Which One Is Right For You?

settings.content:
Choosing the right ring comes down to understanding your partner’s personal style. Ask yourself the following questions:

  • Classic or Contemporary? Timeless solitaire designs versus bold, modern twists.
  • Stone Shape Preference? Popular shapes include Oval Cut, Princess Cut, Emerald Cut, Marquise, and Pear.
  • Lifestyle Considerations? Active lifestyles might favor bezel settings over prongs.

Take a look at the collection slider below to get an overview of what the difference styles look like and find your perfect match.

settings.subheading: An Engagement Ring For the Active Bride to Be
settings.title: The Bezel Set 4CT Moissanite Ring
settings.content: This stone is extremely sparkly and so secure it can withstand the the most active wear. Perfect for the active wife.

settings.text: How to Make the Perfect Choice

settings.content:
Selecting a ring involves more than just aesthetics. Consider:

Materials: Solid Gold vs. Vermeil

  • Solid Gold (10K, 14K, 18K options): Highly durable, pure, hypoallergenic, and maintains value over time.
  • Vermeil (18K gold over sterling silver): More budget-friendly, durable for everyday wear, and offers the luxurious look of gold at a fraction of the cost.

Which to choose? Solid gold is best for heirloom-quality pieces, while vermeil provides beauty without breaking your budget.

Stones: Lab-Grown Diamonds vs. Moissanite

  • Lab-Grown Diamonds: Genuine diamonds created ethically, identical to mined diamonds in brilliance, durability, and aesthetics. Awareness Avenue lab diamonds are D-color, VS1 clarity, offering pure luxury.
  • Moissanite: Offers exceptional sparkle, unmatched durability (nearly as hard as diamond), and unbeatable value. With Awareness Avenue’s top-grade Moissanite (FL, IF clarity, colorless D-grade), brilliance and affordability coexist perfectly

Explore the chart below to see the key details between lab grown diamonds and moissanite.

settings.liquid:
Feature Lab-Grown Diamond Moissanite
Brilliance Elegant glow Fiery sparkle
Durability 10/10 on Mohs scale 9.25/10 on Mohs scale
Ethical & Sustainable Yes Yes
Price Higher More Affordable
Color Options Mostly white Available in various shades

settings.text: How to Choose the Right Material: Vermeil vs. Solid Gold

settings.content:
Another critical factor is the metal type. Awareness Avenue offers both vermeil and solid gold promise rings, each with its own benefits.

Vermeil: Affordable Luxury

Vermeil (pronounced ver-MAY) is sterling silver coated with a thick layer of gold (at least 2.5 microns). It offers the luxurious look of solid gold at a fraction of the price. However, with time, the gold layer may wear down.

Solid Gold: Timeless & Durable

Solid gold, available in 10K, 14K, and 18K, is the ultimate investment for longevity. It resists tarnish, making it a lifelong choice.

Which Should You Choose?

  • If you're on a budget but want a high-end look, go for vermeil.
  • If you want a lifetime ring with zero fading, choose solid gold.

settings.text: Finding the Perfect Size: The Ultimate Ring Sizing Guide

settings.content:
One of the biggest concerns when buying a promise ring is getting the size right. Here’s how to ensure the perfect fit:

How to Measure Your Ring Size at Home:

  1. Use a String or Paper Strip: Wrap it around your finger and mark where it meets.
  2. Measure with a Ruler: Lay the string flat and measure the length in millimeters.
  3. Compare to a Ring Size Chart: Match your measurement to the standard ring sizes.

💡 Tip: If you’re between sizes, go one size up for comfort.

Click here for a comprehensive ring size guide.

settings.text: The Complete Guide: Factors to Consider

settings.content:
When choosing a unique engagement ring, keep these critical points in mind:

Sizing & Comfort

Awareness Avenue’s rings are available in sizes 3-13 and feature classic comfort-fit bands, ensuring an ideal fit for daily wear.

Carat Size & Setting

Carat size significantly impacts visual presence and price. Consider your ideal balance of sparkle versus subtlety:

  • Under 1CT: Delicate and subtle, perfect for minimalist tastes.
  • 1-3CT: Noticeably elegant, suited for most tastes.
  • Over 3CT: Bold and luxurious, for maximum impact.

Settings vary significantly:

  • Prong Setting: Elevates stone, enhancing brilliance.
  • Bezel Setting: Secures stone fully, ideal for active lifestyles.

Channel & Halo Settings: Adds extra sparkle with side stones.
